properties.name: application.security.jwt.secret
properties.description: Used by Jwts for signing key.

properties.name: application.security.jwt.token.prefix
properties.description: Used in case the token came with a prefix (ex. Bearer token).

properties.name: application.email.sending-address
properties.description: Default value for the sender of the email inside the system.

properties.name: application.email.token.validity.period
properties.description: Validity period of the email activation token.
